verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he opposes any immigration legislation that does n’t include “ a real wall ” along the Mexican border]
Trump says [ARG0: he] [V: opposes] [ARG1: any immigration legislation that does n’t include “ a real wall ” along the Mexican border]
Trump says he opposes any immigration legislation that [V: does] n’t include “ a real wall ” along the Mexican border
Trump says he opposes [ARG2: any immigration legislation] [R-ARG2: that] does [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: include] [ARG1: “ a real wall ” along the Mexican border]
